div.p: This value set expansion contains 11 concepts.

td.a: First DTP dose from the primary series was administered-123

tr.td: First DTP dose from the primary series was administered

div.p: Count of vaccines administered (where "Vaccine type" = "DTP-containing vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Primary series") = 1

td.a: Second DTP dose from the primary series was administered-123

tr.td: Second DTP dose from the primary series was administered

div.p: Count of vaccines administered (where "Vaccine type" = "DTP-containing vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Primary series") = 2

td.a: Second DTP dose from the primary series was administered-124

tr.td: Second DTP dose from the primary series was administered

div.p: Count of vaccines administered (where "Vaccine type" = "DTP-containing vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Primary series" ) = 2

td.a: Third DTP dose from the primary series was administered. The primary DTP series has been completed-224

tr.td: Third DTP dose from the primary series was administered. The primary DTP series has been completed

div.p: Count of vaccines administered (where "Vaccine type" = "DTP-containing vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Primary series") = 3 "Completed the primary vaccination series" = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "DTP-containing vaccines")

td.a: The primary DTP series has been completed-100

tr.td: The primary DTP series has been completed

div.p: "Completed the primary vaccination series" = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "DTP-containing vaccines")

td.a: First tetanus and diphtheria booster dose was administered-140

tr.td: First tetanus and diphtheria booster dose was administered

div.p: Count of vaccines administered (where "Vaccine type" = "Tetanus and diphtheria-containing vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Booster dose") = 1

td.a: Second tetanus and diphtheria booster dose was administered-140

tr.td: Second tetanus and diphtheria booster dose was administered

div.p: Count of vaccines administered (where "Vaccine type" = "Tetanus and diphtheria-containing vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Booster dose") = 2

td.a: Third tetanus and diphtheria booster dose was administered. Tetanus and diphtheria immunization schedule has been completed-260

tr.td: Third tetanus and diphtheria booster dose was administered. Tetanus and diphtheria immunization schedule has been completed

div.p: Count of vaccines administered (where "Vaccine type" = "Tetanus and diphtheria-containing vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Booster dose") = 3 "Immunization recommendation status" = "Complete" (where "Vaccine type" = "Tetanus and diphtheria-containing vaccines")

td.a: The primary DTP series has been completed and client's age is between 1 and 6 years-154

tr.td: The primary DTP series has been completed and client's age is between 1 and 6 years

div.p: "Completed the primary vaccination series" = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "DTP-containing vaccines") AND 1 year ≤ Today's date − "Date of birth" ≤ 6 years

td.a: Pertussis-containing booster dose was administered. Pertussis immunization schedule has been completed-234

tr.td: Pertussis-containing booster dose was administered. Pertussis immunization schedule has been completed

div.p: Count of vaccines administered (where "Vaccine type" = "Pertussis-containing vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Booster dose") = 1 "Immunization recommendation status" = "Complete" (where "Vaccine type" = "Pertussis-containing vaccines")

description.value: ValueSet IMMZD18SDTPOnTimeStart for IMMZ.D18.S.DTP.On-time start schedule. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a diphtheria–tetanus–pertussis (DTP) vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any Table: Diphtheria–tetanus–pertussis (DTP) vaccination schedule, on-time start (at ≤ 12 months of age)
